title: Free Heroes?
body: Are there any promotions going on where you can like the LoL facebook page for free heroes like Tristana, Singed etc?

replies.body: I believe Alistar and Tristana are the only ones. Technically all of them are free, because IP grows on trees.
hmm this is league they are champions so riot will not give away free heros or sandwiches ( subs are aka heros)

NO YOU FOOL.

IF YOU HAVE TO EXPLAIN THE JOKE, THERE IS NO JOKE!!!

Captain, the Comedy Field is collapsing, what do we do now?!

{{champion:35}} 
Have you tried bouncing the Graviton Particle Beams off the main deflector dish?

By the gods, you've saved us agai-  Excuse me a moment. I seem to have a dagger in my chest.
